name: 9.7 "Breaking In Is Hard to Do" Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Woody asked, "What's up?" How did Norm reply?
questions.explanation:
The warranty on my liver.

	Since Norm drank so much everyday it is very likely he had liver problems. He has made a few comments throughout the years regarding this yet he continues to drink all day, and most of the night long.

questions.text: Why were Frasier and Lilith upset?
options: Frederick doesn't want to be a psychiatrist.
Frederick cannot tie his shoes yet.
questions.explanation:
Frederick is average.

	Since Lilith and Frasier were so smart they expected their son to be above average as well. They refused to accept the fact that their son was "normal".

questions.text: Why did Lilith say Frederick had the problem he had?
questions.correct: They didn't spend enough time with him.
options: There was a problem during delivery.
questions.explanation:
They didn't spend enough time with him.

	They had to decide who would quit working and spend more time with him. At first they fought over it, then they decided it wasn't a punishment but an hour to spend time with their son.

questions.text: How many sips of beer equals two hours according to Norm?
questions.explanation:
87.

	Norm drank so much he was able to tell the time by it. In another episode we saw that he could keep score in a dart game by just looking at the beer nuts and knowing how many there were in each pile without counting. Norm's life revolved around that bar.

OCD.

	OCD stands for Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder. He was running late and said it was okay because perhaps if he was late enough they'd clean his office for him.

questions.text: What mistake did Frasier say he made?
questions.correct: Leaving the child alone with his mother
options: Drinking so much when he had plans that evening
Leaving his OCD group too long
questions.explanation:
Leaving the child alone with his mother.

	Lilith had called a few times leaving messages for Frasier asking him questions about Frederick. Frasier declared he made a mistake leaving him with her and rushed home deciding he should be the one to spend all day with Frederick.

questions.text: What did Carla and Rebecca do?
options: Moonlighted at Gary's Olde Town Tavern
questions.explanation:
Snuck Rebecca into Robin's prison.

	Rebecca was frustrated because she was not having sex since Robin was in prison. So Carla snuck her in so she could have sex with Robin.

questions.text: What did Cliff say most psychotic killers were?
questions.explanation:
loners.

	He said most of them sit alone in a dark room. He also said that they only had their mothers.

questions.text: Why was Rebecca upset with Robin?
questions.correct: He didn't want to be in jail another year.
options: He bought Jean Marie more gifts.
He killed someone while in prison.
He decided to become a vegetarian.
questions.explanation:
He didn't want to be in jail another year.

	Robin told Rebecca that he wanted to have sex with her. However, he was up for parole and didn't want to stay in jail another year. Rebecca, as usual, thought only of herself and her needs and got angry with him.

Norm!.

	Frasier had been bringing Frederick to the bar. Lilith was upset but Frasier said it had no effect on the child. Then Norm walked in and Frederick yelled, "Norm!"
